thread.title: iPhone 8 predicted to have 3 GB RAM and come in 64GB and 256GB flavors
thread.title_full: iPhone 8 predicted to have 3 GB RAM and come in 64GB and 256GB flavors

author: Christian Zibreg
title: iPhone 8 predicted to have 3 GB RAM and come in 64GB and 256GB flavors
text:
Apple’s first OLED-based iPhone will have three gigabytes of RAM like the current iPhone 7 Plus models and come in two storage capacities—64GB and 128GB—eliminating the current 32GB SKU as the new entry-level option when it comes to storage size. Apple’s flagship 2017 phone, however, won’t feature a curved display due to production and drop test issues with 3D glass. That,...

_
